column2: "Na Rehoboam sii mu kɔr Sekem: osiandɛ Israel nyinara aba Sekem dɛ wɔrebɛhyɛ no hen."

column3: aber a Nebat ba Jeroboam tsee no
column5: mbrɛ oguanee fii ɔhen Solomon enyim kɔree no
column6: ) nna Jeroboam sanee fii Egypt bae."

column2: "Na wɔsomae ma wɔkɛfrɛɛ no; na Jeroboam na Israel nyinara bae
column6: "W’egya yɛɛ hɛn kɔndua durdur: dɛm ntsi afei yɛ w’egya no som dzendzen
column7: na no kɔndua durdur a ɔdze too hɛn do no

column4: na hom mbra me nkyɛn bio. Na ɔman no twee mu kɔree."

column2: "Na ɔhen Rehoboam nye nkɔdaa a wɔsoom n’egya Solomon dɛ apamfo mber a nna ɔtse ase no faa apam dɛ
column3: Afotu bɛn na hom dze rema me ma medze mbuae aasan akɛma ɔman yi?"

column4: Sɛ eyɛ ayamuyie ma ɔman yi
column6: na eka nsɛm pa kyerɛ hɔn a
column7: ɔno wɔbɛyɛ wo nkowaa daa nyina."

column2: "Na ɔpoow nkɔdaa no hɔn apam a wɔdze maa no no
column3: na ɔnye mberantsɛ a wɔnye no nyinii a wɔsom no dɛ apamfo no faa apam."
Afotu bɛn na hom dze ma
column4: ma yɛdze mbuae aasan akɛma ɔman yi a wɔaka akyerɛ me dɛ
column5: Yɛ kɔndua a w’egya dze too hɛn do no harhar no?"

column2: "Na mberantsɛ a wɔnye no nyinii no kaa kyerɛɛ no
column4: Dɛm na ka kyerɛ ɔman yi a wɔbɛkaa kyerɛɛ wo
column7: na ɔwo dze yɛ no harhar ma hɛn no; dɛm na ka kyerɛ hɔn
column8: Me nsatseaba kakraba ɔyɛ dur sen m’egya n’asen."

column2: "Na afei susuampa dɛ m’egya dze kɔndua durdur soaa hom no
column3: emi so mobɔto hom kɔndua no do: m’egya dze mpire tseaa hom
column4: na emi dze medze nyankoma nketsebowa mebɛtsea hom."

column2: "Nna Jeroboam na ɔman no nyinara baa Rehoboam nkyɛn da a otsia ebiasa no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔhen no kae no
column5: Da a otsia ebiasa no hom mbra me nkyɛn bio no."

column2: "Na ɔhen no buaa hɔn ebufuw mu; na ɔhen Rehoboam poow nkɔdaa no hɔn apam no
column4: "na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ mberantsɛ no hɔn apam no tse
column8: mobɔto do: m’egya dze mpire tseaa hom

column2: "Nna ɔhen no enntsie ɔman no; osiandɛ ofi Nyankopɔn hɔ na ɔbaa dɛm
column3: ama EWURADZE eetsim n’asɛm a ɔnam Silonnyi Ahija ne nsa do kaa kyerɛɛ Nebat ba Jeroboam no."

column2: "Na aber a Israel nyinara hun dɛ ɔhen no enntsie hɔn no
column3: nna ɔman no buaa ɔhen no
column5: Ebɛn kyɛpɛn na yɛwɔ wɔ David mu? Nkyii so yennyi egyapadze wɔ Jesse ne ba no mu: Israel e
column6: hom nkɔ hom asesee mu o: afei David
column7: hwɛ wankasa wo fie. Nna Israel nyinara sii mu kɔr hɔn asesee mu."

column2: "Na Israelmba a wɔtsetse Juda nkurow mu no dze Rehoboam dzii hɔn do hen."
"Nna ɔhen Rehoboam somaa Hadoram a ɔhwɛ ɔtowdwuma do no; na Israelmba no siiw no abo
column3: ma ɔtɔree. Na ɔhen Rehoboam yɛɛ ntsɛm foow ne tseaseanam

column2: "Nna Israel tseew etua wɔ David fi do
